page.title: 06An Ogmore Girl's Hobbies.
page.content: My hobbies include judo, guides, swimming and writting. Guides is my favourite. On wednesday night at about 5.45 p.m. i go to Girl Guides at the Baden Powell Centre. I wear a navy blue uniform with a shirt to match. I also wear a leather belt which has a silver lock in the middle and says, "Girl-Guides Association", and a dark blue hat and a light blue scarf. We put a leather band around it to hold it together. We have a hand book telling us about the association and a book about Guide Badges. Sometimes we go tracking. We make things like blankets and covers for underpriveledged children and play games and sometimes we go camping.
